attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AHVConfigSet.address}@@"
data_ips="@@{AHVDataSet.address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"
REPLICA_IPS=($(echo @@{DataSet.address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n"))
noOfShards=$((${#REPLICA_IPS[@]}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AWSConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{AWSDataSet.private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"
REPLICA_IPS=($(echo @@{DataSet.private_ip_address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n"))
noOfShards=$((${#REPLICA_IPS[@]}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AHVConfigSet.address}@@"
data_ips="@@{AHVDataSet.address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{ConfigSet.address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:27017,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":27017"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

echo "[Unit]
Description=High-performance, schema-free document-oriented database
After=network.target
Documentation=https://docs.mongodb.org/manual

[Service]
User=mongod
Group=mongod
Environment=\"OPTIONS=--port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log\"
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mongos \$OPTIONS
PermissionsStartOnly=true
PIDFile=/var/run/mongodb/mongos.pid
# file size
LimitFSIZE=infinity
# cpu time
LimitCPU=infinity
# virtual memory size
LimitAS=infinity
# open files
LimitNOFILE=64000
# processes/threads
LimitNPROC=64000
# total threads (user+kernel)
TasksMax=infinity
TasksAccounting=false
# Recommended limits for for mongod as specified in
# http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/ulimit/#recommended-settings

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /usr/lib/systemd/system/mongos.service

sudo systemctl start mongos
#sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"
REPLICA_IPS=($(echo @@{DataSet.address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n"))
noOfShards=$((${#REPLICA_IPS[@]}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AHVConfigSet.address}@@"
data_ips="@@{AHVDataSet.address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{ConfigSet.address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:27017,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":27017"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

echo "[Unit]
Description=High-performance, schema-free document-oriented database
After=network.target
Documentation=https://docs.mongodb.org/manual

[Service]
User=mongod
Group=mongod
Environment=\"OPTIONS=--port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log\"
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mongos \$OPTIONS
PermissionsStartOnly=true
PIDFile=/var/run/mongodb/mongos.pid
# file size
LimitFSIZE=infinity
# cpu time
LimitCPU=infinity
# virtual memory size
LimitAS=infinity
# open files
LimitNOFILE=64000
# processes/threads
LimitNPROC=64000
# total threads (user+kernel)
TasksMax=infinity
TasksAccounting=false
# Recommended limits for for mongod as specified in
# http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/ulimit/#recommended-settings

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /usr/lib/systemd/system/mongos.service

sudo systemctl start mongos
#sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"
REPLICA_IPS=($(echo @@{DataSet.address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n"))
noOfShards=$((${#REPLICA_IPS[@]}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

sudo setenforce 0

name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1

sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:27017\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 5

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"

set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AHVConfigSet.address}@@"
data_ips="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{AHVRouter.address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/sd | grep -v sda | xargs sudo  pvcreate

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd 
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/sde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/sdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

echo "/dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata ${DATA_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noatime,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal ${JOURNAL_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog ${LOG_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal

sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

sudo blockdev --setra 32 /dev/dm-2
sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

REPLICA_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"
INDEX=@@{calm_array_index}@@
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET=@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@
ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS=$(echo ${REPLICA_IPS} | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

tmp=$((${INDEX}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicasetNo=$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicaSetName="dataReplSet${replicasetNo}"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: $replicaSetName/g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: shardsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: /mongodb/log/mongod.log#' /etc/mongod.conf

### Getting replicaset members details 
replica_cnt=0
declare -a replicaset_members

for replica in $ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS
do
  tmp=$((${replica_cnt}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
  i="$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))"
  replicaset_members[$i]=${replicaset_members[$i]}"{\"_id\": $replica_cnt, host:\"$replica:27017\"},"
  replica_cnt=$(($replica_cnt + 1))
done

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 5

### Initiating replicaset 
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "$replicaSetName",
  "members": [ ${replicaset_members[$replicasetNo]}]
}
EOF
)
sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
sleep 2

#!/bin/bash

node=$(echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)

if [[ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" != "$(($node-1))" ]];then
  exit 0
fi

eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '
import json,sys
data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOST={}".format(data["shards"][len(data["shards"])-1]["host"])
')
eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '
import json,sys
data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOSTTOMOVE={}".format(data["shards"][@@{SHARD_TO_MOVE}@@-1]["host"])
')
host_state=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['state']"`
if [[ "$host_state" == "started" ]] ; then
  sleep 5
fi
host_state=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['state']"`
if [[ "$host_state" == "ongoing" ]] ; then
  if [[ "@@{SHARD_TO_MOVE}@@" == "" ]] ; then
    echo "Please enter the shard number value to move tables."
    exit 1
  fi
  dbstomove=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['dbsToMove']"`
  eval $(echo $dbstomove | python -c 'import json,sys ; data=json.load(sys.stdin) ; print "DBSTOMOVE={}".format(",".join(data))')
  for x in $(echo $DBSTOMOVE | tr "," "\n") ; do
     echo "echo moving $x"
     mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({ movePrimary: '$x', to: '${HOSTTOMOVE}' })"
  done
  mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})"
  echo "completed removing shard '${HOST}'"
elif [[ "$host_state" == "completed" ]] ; then
  echo "Host removal completed"
fi

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AHVConfigSet.address}@@"
data_ips="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{AHVRouter.address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/sd | grep -v sda | xargs sudo  pvcreate

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd 
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/sde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/sdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

echo "/dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata ${DATA_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noatime,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal ${JOURNAL_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog ${LOG_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal

sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

sudo blockdev --setra 32 /dev/dm-2
sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

REPLICA_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"
INDEX=@@{calm_array_index}@@
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET=@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@
ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS=$(echo ${REPLICA_IPS} | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

tmp=$((${INDEX}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicasetNo=$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicaSetName="dataReplSet${replicasetNo}"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: $replicaSetName/g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: shardsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: /mongodb/log/mongod.log#' /etc/mongod.conf

### Getting replicaset members details 
replica_cnt=0
declare -a replicaset_members

for replica in $ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS
do
  tmp=$((${replica_cnt}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
  i="$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))"
  replicaset_members[$i]=${replicaset_members[$i]}"{\"_id\": $replica_cnt, host:\"$replica:27017\"},"
  replica_cnt=$(($replica_cnt + 1))
done

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 5

### Initiating replicaset 
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "$replicaSetName",
  "members": [ ${replicaset_members[$replicasetNo]}]
}
EOF
)
sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
sleep 2

#!/bin/bash

node=$(echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)

if [[ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" != "$(($node-1))" ]];then

fi

eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '

data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOST={}".format(data["shards"][len(data["shards"])-1]["host"])
')

set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AWSConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{AWSDataSet.private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{ConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:27017,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":27017"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

echo "[Unit]
Description=High-performance, schema-free document-oriented database
After=network.target
Documentation=https://docs.mongodb.org/manual

[Service]
User=mongod
Group=mongod
Environment=\"OPTIONS=--port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log\"
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mongos \$OPTIONS
PermissionsStartOnly=true
PIDFile=/var/run/mongodb/mongos.pid
# file size
LimitFSIZE=infinity
# cpu time
LimitCPU=infinity
# virtual memory size
LimitAS=infinity
# open files
LimitNOFILE=64000
# processes/threads
LimitNPROC=64000
# total threads (user+kernel)
TasksMax=infinity
TasksAccounting=false
# Recommended limits for for mongod as specified in
# http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/ulimit/#recommended-settings

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /usr/lib/systemd/system/mongos.service

sudo systemctl start mongos
#sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"
REPLICA_IPS=($(echo @@{DataSet.private_ip_address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n"))
noOfShards=$((${#REPLICA_IPS[@]}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{ConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:27017,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":27017"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

echo "[Unit]
Description=High-performance, schema-free document-oriented database
After=network.target
Documentation=https://docs.mongodb.org/manual

[Service]
User=mongod
Group=mongod
Environment=\"OPTIONS=--port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log\"
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mongos \$OPTIONS
PermissionsStartOnly=true
PIDFile=/var/run/mongodb/mongos.pid
# file size
LimitFSIZE=infinity
# cpu time
LimitCPU=infinity
# virtual memory size
LimitAS=infinity
# open files
LimitNOFILE=64000
# processes/threads
LimitNPROC=64000
# total threads (user+kernel)
TasksMax=infinity
TasksAccounting=false
# Recommended limits for for mongod as specified in
# http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/ulimit/#recommended-settings

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /usr/lib/systemd/system/mongos.service

sudo systemctl start mongos
#sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"
REPLICA_IPS=($(echo @@{DataSet.private_ip_address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n"))
noOfShards=$((${#REPLICA_IPS[@]}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{AWSDataSet.private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{AWSRouter.private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:27017\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 15

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"

#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AWSConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{AWSRouter.private_ip_address}@@"

count=1

count=1

count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):

  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/xvd | grep -v xvda | xargs sudo  pvcreate

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/xvdb /dev/xvdc /dev/xvdd 
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/xvde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/xvdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal

sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#sudo blockdev --setra 32 /dev/dm-2
#sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

REPLICA_IPS="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"
INDEX=@@{calm_array_index}@@
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET=@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@
ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS=$(echo ${REPLICA_IPS} | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

tmp=$((${INDEX}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicasetNo=$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicaSetName="dataReplSet${replicasetNo}"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: $replicaSetName/g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: shardsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: /mongodb/log/mongod.log#' /etc/mongod.conf

### Getting replicaset members details 
replica_cnt=0
declare -a replicaset_members

for replica in $ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS
do
  tmp=$((${replica_cnt}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
  i="$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))"
  replicaset_members[$i]=${replicaset_members[$i]}"{\"_id\": $replica_cnt, host:\"$replica:27017\"},"
  replica_cnt=$(($replica_cnt + 1))
done

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 15

### Initiating replicaset 
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "$replicaSetName",
  "members": [ ${replicaset_members[$replicasetNo]}]
}
EOF
)
sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
sleep 2

#!/bin/bash

node=$(echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)

if [[ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" != "$(($node-1))" ]];then
  exit 0
fi

eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '
import json,sys
data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOST={}".format(data["shards"][len(data["shards"])-1]["host"])
')
eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '
import json,sys
data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOSTTOMOVE={}".format(data["shards"][@@{SHARD_TO_MOVE}@@-1]["host"])
')
host_state=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['state']"`
if [[ "$host_state" == "started" ]] ; then
  sleep 5
fi
host_state=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['state']"`
if [[ "$host_state" == "ongoing" ]] ; then
  if [[ "@@{SHARD_TO_MOVE}@@" == "" ]] ; then
    echo "Please enter the shard number value to move tables."
    exit 1
  fi
  dbstomove=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['dbsToMove']"`
  eval $(echo $dbstomove | python -c 'import json,sys ; data=json.load(sys.stdin) ; print "DBSTOMOVE={}".format(",".join(data))')
  for x in $(echo $DBSTOMOVE | tr "," "\n") ; do
     echo "echo moving $x"
     mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({ movePrimary: '$x', to: '${HOSTTOMOVE}' })"
  done
  mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})"
  echo "completed removing shard '${HOST}'"
elif [[ "$host_state" == "completed" ]] ; then
  echo "Host removal completed"
fi

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{AWSConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{AWSRouter.private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/xvd | grep -v xvda | xargs sudo  pvcreate

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/xvdb /dev/xvdc /dev/xvdd 
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/xvde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/xvdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal

sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#sudo blockdev --setra 32 /dev/dm-2
#sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf

set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{GCPConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{GCPDataSet.private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{ConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:27017,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":27017"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

echo "[Unit]
Description=High-performance, schema-free document-oriented database
After=network.target
Documentation=https://docs.mongodb.org/manual

[Service]
User=mongod
Group=mongod
Environment=\"OPTIONS=--port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log\"
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mongos \$OPTIONS
PermissionsStartOnly=true
PIDFile=/var/run/mongodb/mongos.pid
# file size
LimitFSIZE=infinity
# cpu time
LimitCPU=infinity
# virtual memory size
LimitAS=infinity
# open files
LimitNOFILE=64000
# processes/threads
LimitNPROC=64000
# total threads (user+kernel)
TasksMax=infinity
TasksAccounting=false
# Recommended limits for for mongod as specified in
# http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/ulimit/#recommended-settings

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /usr/lib/systemd/system/mongos.service

sudo systemctl start mongos

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{GCPConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{GCPDataSet.private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{ConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:27017,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":27017"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

echo "[Unit]
Description=High-performance, schema-free document-oriented database
After=network.target
Documentation=https://docs.mongodb.org/manual

[Service]
User=mongod
Group=mongod
Environment=\"OPTIONS=--port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log\"
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mongos \$OPTIONS
PermissionsStartOnly=true
PIDFile=/var/run/mongodb/mongos.pid
# file size
LimitFSIZE=infinity
# cpu time
LimitCPU=infinity
# virtual memory size
LimitAS=infinity
# open files
LimitNOFILE=64000
# processes/threads
LimitNPROC=64000
# total threads (user+kernel)
TasksMax=infinity
TasksAccounting=false
# Recommended limits for for mongod as specified in
# http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/ulimit/#recommended-settings

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /usr/lib/systemd/system/mongos.service

sudo systemctl start mongos
#sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2

#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{GCPDataSet.private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{GCPRouter.private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:27017\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 15

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"

#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{GCPConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{GCPRouter.private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/sd | grep -v sda | xargs sudo  pvcreate

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd 
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/sde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/sdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

echo "/dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata ${DATA_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noatime,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal ${JOURNAL_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog ${LOG_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal

sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

sudo blockdev --setra 32 /dev/dm-2
sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

REPLICA_IPS="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"
INDEX=@@{calm_array_index}@@
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET=@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@
ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS=$(echo ${REPLICA_IPS} | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

tmp=$((${INDEX}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicasetNo=$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicaSetName="dataReplSet${replicasetNo}"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: $replicaSetName/g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: shardsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: /mongodb/log/mongod.log#' /etc/mongod.conf

### Getting replicaset members details 
replica_cnt=0
declare -a replicaset_members

for replica in $ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS
do
  tmp=$((${replica_cnt}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
  i="$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))"
  replicaset_members[$i]=${replicaset_members[$i]}"{\"_id\": $replica_cnt, host:\"$replica:27017\"},"
  replica_cnt=$(($replica_cnt + 1))
done

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 15

### Initiating replicaset 
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "$replicaSetName",
  "members": [ ${replicaset_members[$replicasetNo]}]
}
EOF
)
sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
sleep 2

#!/bin/bash

node=$(echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)

if [[ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" != "$(($node-1))" ]];then
  exit 0
fi

eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '
import json,sys
data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOST={}".format(data["shards"][len(data["shards"])-1]["host"])
')
eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '
import json,sys
data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOSTTOMOVE={}".format(data["shards"][@@{SHARD_TO_MOVE}@@-1]["host"])
')
host_state=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['state']"`
if [[ "$host_state" == "started" ]] ; then
  sleep 5
fi
host_state=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['state']"`
if [[ "$host_state" == "ongoing" ]] ; then
  if [[ "@@{SHARD_TO_MOVE}@@" == "" ]] ; then
    echo "Please enter the shard number value to move tables."
    exit 1
  fi
  dbstomove=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['dbsToMove']"`
  eval $(echo $dbstomove | python -c 'import json,sys ; data=json.load(sys.stdin) ; print "DBSTOMOVE={}".format(",".join(data))')
  for x in $(echo $DBSTOMOVE | tr "," "\n") ; do
     echo "echo moving $x"
     mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({ movePrimary: '$x', to: '${HOSTTOMOVE}' })"
  done
  mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})"
  echo "completed removing shard '${HOST}'"
elif [[ "$host_state" == "completed" ]] ; then
  echo "Host removal completed"
fi

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

import re
config_ips="@@{AzureConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{AzureDataSet.private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{ConfigSet.private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:27017,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":27017"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

echo "[Unit]
Description=High-performance, schema-free document-oriented database
After=network.target
Documentation=https://docs.mongodb.org/manual

[Service]
User=mongod
Group=mongod
Environment=\"OPTIONS=--port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log\"
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mongos \$OPTIONS
PermissionsStartOnly=true
PIDFile=/var/run/mongodb/mongos.pid
# file size
LimitFSIZE=infinity
# cpu time
LimitCPU=infinity
# virtual memory size
LimitAS=infinity
# open files
LimitNOFILE=64000
# processes/threads
LimitNPROC=64000
# total threads (user+kernel)
TasksMax=infinity
TasksAccounting=false
# Recommended limits for for mongod as specified in
# http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/ulimit/#recommended-settings

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /usr/lib/systemd/system/mongos.service

sudo systemctl start mongos
#sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"
REPLICA_IPS=($(echo @@{DataSet.private_ip_address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n"))
noOfShards=$((${#REPLICA_IPS[@]}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{AzureDataSet.private_ip_address}@@"
router_ips="@@{AzureRouter.private_ip_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:27017\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 15

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]

baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:27017\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 15

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

REPLICA_IPS="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"
INDEX=@@{calm_array_index}@@
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET=@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@
ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS=$(echo ${REPLICA_IPS} | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

tmp=$((${INDEX}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicasetNo=$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicaSetName="dataReplSet${replicasetNo}"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: $replicaSetName/g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: shardsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: /mongodb/log/mongod.log#' /etc/mongod.conf

### Getting replicaset members details 
replica_cnt=0
declare -a replicaset_members

for replica in $ARRAY_REPLICA_IPS
do
  tmp=$((${replica_cnt}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
  i="$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))"
  replicaset_members[$i]=${replicaset_members[$i]}"{\"_id\": $replica_cnt, host:\"$replica:27017\"},"
  replica_cnt=$(($replica_cnt + 1))
done

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 15

### Initiating replicaset 
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "$replicaSetName",
  "members": [ ${replicaset_members[$replicasetNo]}]
}
EOF
)
sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
sleep 2

#!/bin/bash

node=$(echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)

if [[ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" != "$(($node-1))" ]];then
  exit 0
fi

eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '
import json,sys
data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOST={}".format(data["shards"][len(data["shards"])-1]["host"])
')
eval $(mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand( { listShards: 1 } )' | python -c '
import json,sys
data=json.load(sys.stdin)
print "HOSTTOMOVE={}".format(data["shards"][@@{SHARD_TO_MOVE}@@-1]["host"])
')
host_state=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['state']"`
if [[ "$host_state" == "started" ]] ; then
  sleep 5
fi
host_state=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['state']"`
if [[ "$host_state" == "ongoing" ]] ; then
  if [[ "@@{SHARD_TO_MOVE}@@" == "" ]] ; then
    echo "Please enter the shard number value to move tables."
    exit 1
  fi
  dbstomove=`mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})['dbsToMove']"`
  eval $(echo $dbstomove | python -c 'import json,sys ; data=json.load(sys.stdin) ; print "DBSTOMOVE={}".format(",".join(data))')
  for x in $(echo $DBSTOMOVE | tr "," "\n") ; do
     echo "echo moving $x"
     mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({ movePrimary: '$x', to: '${HOSTTOMOVE}' })"
  done
  mongo --host router1.mongodb --port 27017 --quiet --eval "db.adminCommand({removeShard: '${HOST}'})"
  echo "completed removing shard '${HOST}'"
elif [[ "$host_state" == "completed" ]] ; then
  echo "Host removal completed"
fi

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{VMwareConfigSet.address}@@"
data_ips="@@{VMwareDataSet.address}@@"
router_ips="@@{calm_array_address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{ConfigSet.address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:27017,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":27017"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

echo "[Unit]
Description=High-performance, schema-free document-oriented database
After=network.target
Documentation=https://docs.mongodb.org/manual

[Service]
User=mongod
Group=mongod
Environment=\"OPTIONS=--port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log\"
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mongos \$OPTIONS
PermissionsStartOnly=true
PIDFile=/var/run/mongodb/mongos.pid
# file size
LimitFSIZE=infinity
# cpu time
LimitCPU=infinity
# virtual memory size
LimitAS=infinity
# open files
LimitNOFILE=64000
# processes/threads
LimitNPROC=64000
# total threads (user+kernel)
TasksMax=infinity
TasksAccounting=false
# Recommended limits for for mongod as specified in
# http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/ulimit/#recommended-settings

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /usr/lib/systemd/system/mongos.service

sudo systemctl start mongos
#sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"
REPLICA_IPS=($(echo @@{DataSet.address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n"))
noOfShards=$((${#REPLICA_IPS[@]}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))

count=0
for ((number=1;number <= $noOfShards;number++))
do
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet${number}"
  sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/${REPLICA_IPS[${count}]}:27017\" )"
  count=$(($count + ${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
done

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{VMwareDataSet.address}@@"
router_ips="@@{VMwareRouter.address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:27017\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 5

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

cat > /tmp/set-hostnames.py <<EOF
#!/usr/bin/python
import re
config_ips="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
data_ips="@@{VMwareDataSet.address}@@"
router_ips="@@{VMwareRouter.address}@@"

hostfile = open('/etc/hosts', 'r').read()
print hostfile
hostfile = re.sub('\n#MONGODB-BEGIN.*?#MONGODB-END', '', hostfile, flags=re.DOTALL)
hostfile += "#MONGODB-BEGIN\n"
count=1
for ip in config_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " config" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in data_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " data" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
count=1
for ip in router_ips.split(','):
  hostfile += ip + " router" + str(count) + ".mongodb\n"
  count += 1
hostfile += "#MONGODB-END\n"
open('/etc/hosts', 'w').write(hostfile)
EOF

sudo python /tmp/set-hostnames.py

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}
sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:27017\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 5

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

sudo mongo --host ${INTERNAL_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
